duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care in medical-surgical settings, including postoperative care, wound care, and administering medications.
Collaborate with healthcare teams to coordinate patient care and ensure essential documentation is completed accurately.
Demonstrate compassion, empathy, and effective communication with patients and their families.
Perform critical care interventions and respond to emergencies in the medical-surgical unit.
Maintain accurate nursing documentation and adhere to healthcare protocols and standards.
Coordinate with healthcare professionals to provide comprehensive wound care and promote healing.
Administer medications and treatments according to the patient's care plan and physician orders.
Collaborate with the healthcare team to optimize patient outcomes and ensure high-quality care delivery.
Provide education and support to patients and their families to promote health and wellness.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Nursing or related field (Master's degree preferred)
